instructions: Tap the Track Controls button Track Controls button in the control bar, tap the name of the sound near the top of the track controls, then tap Save. On iPhone 8, iPhone 7 or iPhone 6s, tap the Settings button Settings button in the control bar, tap Track Controls, tap the name of the sound near the top of the track controls, then tap Save. Type a name for your custom sound, then tap Done. The first time you save a custom sound, a new Custom category appears. To rename or delete the sound, tap Edit, then tap the icon (to rename) or the red circle (to delete).
